通过下载bitcoin-testnet，并使用网站中的一些测试比特币向新建的钱包转发一笔交易获得的数据如图所示：
{
  "block_height": -1,
  "block_index": -1,
  "hash": "a243f2611deeb74bdc0a080dde267c0e1906e172b94daa3691036432107b340e",
  "hex": "",
  "addresses": [
    "msLoJikUfxbc2U5UhRSjc2svusBSqMdqxZ"
  ],
  "total": 488963967,
  "fees": 1000,
  "size": 267,
  "vsize": 267,
  "preference": "low",
  "relayed_by": "104.248.32.170",
  "received": "2022-07-20T07:01:01.687Z",
  "ver": 1,
  "double_spend": false,
  "vin_sz": 1,
  "vout_sz": 2,
  "data_protocol": "unknown",
  "confirmations": 0,
  "inputs": [
    {
      "prev_hash": "d4e0ea7e87d51f3322388c6cb9edce89aa8c4aa3a26c37a2c07aa5afb809c914",
      "output_index": 1,
      "script": "483045022100e6f0980b4840ad8bc6e4a27a64e273ee11aaafb08fdf23ab6d176a70e4ecead002200a24ba2c0d6e411d592f748c559db80b097e626fa5d87e6bec14176088387d7d012102ffb50c171a06fdcf8a8cd1190e53951557bc68932669a038d95e8d863baeb871",
      "output_value": 488964967,
      "sequence": 4294967295,
      "addresses": [
        "msLoJikUfxbc2U5UhRSjc2svusBSqMdqxZ"
      ],
      "script_type": "pay-to-pubkey-hash",
      "age": 2286766
    }
  ],
  "outputs": [
    {
      "value": 0,
      "script": "6a4066656262363636356262313530343261303037313034376630386337306433376331633230643163663266626532323938373166386561313661366138313963",
      "addresses": null,
      "script_type": "null-data",
      "data_hex": "66656262363636356262313530343261303037313034376630386337306433376331633230643163663266626532323938373166386561313661366138313963",
      "data_string": "febb6665bb15042a0071047f08c70d37c1c20d1cf2fbe229871f8ea16a6a819c"
    },
    {
      "value": 488963967,
      "script": "76a91481b5d8b82799bcd127904e665f1f217a16cd635188ac",
      "addresses": [
        "msLoJikUfxbc2U5UhRSjc2svusBSqMdqxZ"
      ],
      "script_type": "pay-to-pubkey-hash"
    }
  ]
}
其中的hex为raw数据，对于hex每个字段进行了分析
01000000//版本号，4byte
01//交易输入个数
14c909b8afa57ac0a2376ca2a34a8caa89ceedb96c8c3822331fd5877eeae0d4//UTXO，小端编码
01000000//UTXO的索引
6b//输入脚本长度
483045022100e6f0980b4840ad8bc6e4a27a64e273ee11aaafb08fdf23ab6d176a70e4ecead002200a24ba2c0d6e411d592f748c559db80b097e626fa5d87e6bec14176088387d7d012102ffb50c171a06fdcf8a8cd1190e53951557bc68932669a038d95e8d863baeb871//输入脚本
ffffffff//交易序列号
02//交易输出个数
0000000000000000//输出金额，8字节
42//输出1脚本长度
6a4066656262363636356262313530343261303037313034376630386337306433376331633230643163663266626532323938373166386561313661366138313963//输出1脚本
7fff241d00000000//输出金额，8字节
19//输出2脚本长度
76a91481b5d8b82799bcd127904e665f1f217a16cd635188ac//输出2脚本
00000000//锁定时间
